name: Virus-Hunter
description:
Welcome to Virus Hunter.
Made for the OpenGameArt Spring 2020 GameJam

As people started to stockpile toilet paper during the corona crisis...
Wouldn't it be nice if it would fall from the sky?
And you could kill viruses with it? I do not know but I laughed my head off.

OpenGameArt assets used:

https://opengameart.org/content/golden-ui-bigger-than-ever-edition
